properties.entry: SELECT COUNT(*) as COUNT FROM BOARD WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND STATUS = 'Y'

SELECT * FROM ( SELECT BOARD_NO , CATEGORY_NAME , BOARD_TITLE , USER_ID , BOARD_COUNT , REGIST_DATE , ROW_NUMBER() OVER(ORDER BY BOARD_NO DESC) as RNUM FROM BOARD B JOIN CATEGORY USING(CATEGORY_NO) JOIN MEMBER ON (USER_NO = BOARD_WRITER) WHERE BOARD_TYPE = 1 AND B.STATUS = 'Y' ) WHERE RNUM BETWEEN ? AND ?
INSERT INTO BOARD ( BOARD_NO , BOARD_TYPE , CATEGORY_NO , BOARD_TITLE , BOARD_CONTENT , BOARD_WRITER ) VALUES ( SEQ_BNO.NEXTVAL , 1 , ? , ? , ? , ? )
INSERT INTO ATTACHMENT ( FILE_NO , REF_BOARD_NO , ORIGIN_NAME , CHANGE_NAME , FILE_PATH ) VALUES ( SEQ_FNO.NEXTVAL , SEQ_BNO.CURRVAL , ? , ? , ? )
